summary:
You know that spiderman ps4 game? 
Are they any cheat codes? Specifically for the task master missions? 
This is a problem I’ve...
body:
You know that spiderman ps4 game?

Are they any cheat codes? Specifically for the task master missions?

This is a problem I’ve encountered and don’t fault the game for, but it’s keeping me from a 100% completion.

I get motion sickness when swinging around following the drones and trying to destroy the bombs. It wasn’t too bad with boss battles cause I could finish at my own pace. But because the challenge points are timed and I’m zipping and swinging incredibly fast to reach the bombs and free falling to get the drone check points, I’m left a little woozy.

Me after three drone challenge attempts:

Again, this is an issue I have. Not the game/developers’ fault.

Need to block antis or certain blogs check: *antis to block, #blogs to block, #blogs to report. Also tags you may need to blacklist if needed: #anti bs, #nsfw, #fandom wank.

summary:
Peter: have you and Venom seen alien?
Eddie: yes, why?
Peter: well Halloween is coming up and there’s a few bullies-
Venom:...
body:
Peter: have you and Venom seen alien?

Eddie: yes, why?

Peter: well Halloween is coming up and there’s a few bullies-

Venom: We’ll do it!

Eddie: if your saying venom pops out of my stomach the answer is no.

Peter: but one hit me!

Venom and Eddie: We’ll do it!
